Eric Schmidt 's role will transition to focusing on external deals such as partnerships and government outreach. Eric Schmidt insisted that the move was part of a ''streamlining'' effort rather than a management shake-up. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, said Eric Schmidt .
